mapper.insert: insert into systemaccountflow (actionTime, actionType, note, amount, usableAmount, freezedAmount) values (#{actionTime}, #{actionType}, #{note}, #{amount}, #{usableAmount}, #{freezedAmount})
mapper.update: update systemaccountflow set actionTime = #{actionTime}, actionType = #{actionType}, note = #{note}, amount = #{amount}, usableAmount = #{usableAmount}, freezedAmount = #{freezedAmount} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, actionTime, actionType, note, amount, usableAmount, freezedAmount from systemaccountflow
